detectors.description:
SGNConversionManager.sgn2sgr(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SGNConversionManager.sol#143-147) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(_amount <= MAX_AMOUNT) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SGNConversionManager.sol#144)
	- assert(bool)(_index < numerators.length) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SGNConversionManager.sol#145)

SGNConversionManager.sgn2sgr(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SGNConversionManager.sol#143-147) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- _amount * numerators[_index] / DENOMINATOR (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SGNConversionManager.sol#146)
